broadcast.tips.hoe: 🔔 <color:#FCE7C8>你知道吗？一把钩子会自动复制你的作物。
broadcast.bugs: 🐛 找到 bug? 在 <color:#FCE7C8><click:open_url:'https://github.com/SkyRealmDE/bugreports/issues'><hover:show_text:'Click me'>GitHub上报告!</hover></click></color>
broadcast.tips.trypremium: 🔑 <color:#FCE7C8>使用 <white>/premium</white>尝试高级功能！在 <click:open_url:'https://store.sky-realm.com'><hover:show_text:'Click to open store'><white>我们的商店</white></hover></click></color>
broadcast.tips.generator: ⚒ <color:#FCE7C8>Upgrade your generator via <white>/realms</white> → <white>upgrades</white> → <white>generator</white> and boost your resource production!</color>
broadcast.tips.automation: :rowt: <color:#FCE7C8>主自动化来移动你的利润。一个小的计划可以带来巨大的收益！</color>
broadcast.tips.inviteFriends: 🤝 <color:#FCE7C8>You can invite friends to your realm with <white>/realm invite \<name\></white>. Play together and share the fun!</color>
broadcast.tips.shadyNpcs: 💸 <color:#FCE7C8>有些NPC是阴暗的，支付的费用较少。在销售前比较价格！</color>
broadcast.tips.dirtSmelt: 🔥 <color:#FCE7C8>你可以把土熔化成沙子。谁说你不能把土变成有用的东西吗？</color>
broadcast.tips.crushCobble: 🔨 <color:#FCE7C8>Crush cobblestone into gravel for crafting, building, or trading!</color>
broadcast.tips.crushGravel: 🔨 <color:#FCE7C8>Crush gravel into sand for crafting, building, or trading!</color>
broadcast.tips.mud: 🌀 <color:#FCE7C8>与沙子或土混合水以创建泥土—这是各种配方的一个关键成分！</color>
broadcast.tips.dryMud: 🌞 <color:#FCE7C8>干净的泥土来获得土。这是一个干净的循环资源方式!</color>
broadcast.tips.mcCrafter: 🔧 <color:#FCE7C8>As of Minecraft 1.21, the new crafter block can auto-craft any recipe for you!</color>
broadcast.tips.bamboo: 🎋 <color:#FCE7C8>Bamboo 是一个快速的替代木头来源。快进制它!</color>
